summary: SRS AIR BAG LIGHT ILLUMINATED ON DASH. DEALER DIAGNOSED (FOR $85) THAT DRIVER'S SIDE AIR BAG UNIT NEEDED TO BE REPLACED AT COST OF $1100. CAR NEVER IN ACCIDENT. LIGHT JUST STAYED ON ONE MORNING ON START.**** DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER FROM ARTEMIS****760791. *AK         *JB
